verses.verse: It happened in those <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> <S%H6908>together<s%> for <S%H6635>warfare,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3045>"Know<s%> <S%H3045>assuredly<s%> that you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> with me in the <S%H4264>army,<s%> you and your <S%H582>men.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H397>Achish,<s%> <S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> what your <S%H5650>servant<s%> will <S%H6213>do.<s%>" <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "Therefore will I <S%H7760>make<s%> you my <S%H8104>bodyguard<s%> <S%H7218><s%> for <S%H3117>ever.<s%>"

Now <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H5594>lamented<s%> <S%H6912>him,<s%> and buried him in <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> even in his own <S%H5892>city.<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had put <S%H5493>away<s%> those who had familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> out of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H7766>Shunem:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>together,<s%> and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>
When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> he was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>didn't<s%> answer <S%H2472>him,<s%> neither by dreams, nor by <S%H224>Urim,<s%> nor by <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H1245>"Seek<s%> me a <S%H802>woman<s%> who <S%H1172>has<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> that I may <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H1875>her,<s%> and inquire of <S%H5650>her.<s%>" His servants <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H802>him,<s%> "Behold, there is a woman who <S%H1172>has<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%> at <S%H5874>Endor.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2664>disguised<s%> <S%H3847>himself,<s%> and put on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>clothing,<s%> and <S%H3212>went,<s%> he and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H935>him,<s%> and they came to the <S%H802>woman<s%> by <S%H3915>night:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please <S%H7080>divine<s%> to me by the familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> and bring me <S%H5927>up<s%> whomever I shall name to <S%H559>you.<s%>"

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3045>him,<s%> "Behold, you know what <S%H7586>Saul<s%> has <S%H6213>done,<s%> how he has cut <S%H3772>off<s%> those who have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> out of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Why then do you lay a <S%H5367>snare<s%> for my <S%H5315>life,<s%> to cause me to <S%H4191>die?<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to her by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> no <S%H5771>punishment<s%> <S%H518>shall<s%> <S%H7136>happen<s%> to you for this <S%H1697>thing.<s%>"
Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Whom shall I bring <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H559>you?<s%>" He said, "Bring <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> up for <S%H5927>me.<s%>"

When the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> she <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice;<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Why have you <S%H7411>deceived<s%> <S%H7586>me?<s%> For you are Saul!"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3372>her,<s%> "Don't be afraid. For what do you <S%H7200>see?<s%>" The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H430>god<s%> coming <S%H430>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8389>her,<s%> "What does he look like?" She <S%H559>said,<s%> "An <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> comes <S%H5927>up.<s%> He is <S%H5844>covered<s%> with a <S%H4598>robe.<s%>" <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that it was <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> and he <S%H6915>bowed<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and showed <S%H7812>respect.<s%>

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "Why have you <S%H7264>disturbed<s%> <S%H5927>me,<s%> to bring me up?" <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> "I am <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6887>distressed;<s%> for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> make <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H430>me,<s%> and God has <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H3027>me,<s%> and answers me no more, neither by <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> nor <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H2472>dreams.<s%> Therefore I have <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3045>you,<s%> that you may make known to me what I shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>"
<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why then do you <S%H7592>ask<s%> of <S%H3068>me,<s%> since Yahweh has <S%H5493>departed<s%> from you and has become your <S%H6145>adversary?<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> to you as he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by <S%H3027>me.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7167>torn<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> it to your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> even to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

<S%H834>Because<s%> you <S%H6963>didn't<s%> obey the voice of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6213>didn't<s%> execute his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> on <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> to you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also with you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> will be with <S%H3068>me.<s%> Yahweh will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H4116>immediately<s%> his <S%H4393>full<s%> <S%H6967>length<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3966>was<s%> <S%H3372>terrified,<s%> because of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%> There was no <S%H3581>strength<s%> in <S%H398>him;<s%> for he had eaten no <S%H3899>bread<s%> all the <S%H3117>day,<s%> nor all the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H926>troubled,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8198>him,<s%> "Behold, your handmaid has <S%H8085>listened<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and I have <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to your <S%H1697>words<s%> which you spoke to <S%H1696>me.<s%>

Now <S%H8085>therefore,<s%> please listen also to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> and let me <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H398>you;<s%> and eat, that you may have <S%H3581>strength,<s%> when you <S%H3212>go<s%> on your <S%H1870>way.<s%>"

But he <S%H3985>refused,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H398>eat.<s%> But his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> together with the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H6555>constrained<s%> <S%H8085>him;<s%> and he listened to their <S%H6963>voice.<s%> So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

The <S%H802>woman<s%> had a <S%H4770>fattened<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%> in the <S%H1004>house.<s%> She <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and <S%H2076>killed<s%> <S%H3947>it;<s%> and she took <S%H7058>flour,<s%> and <S%H3888>kneaded<s%> <S%H644>it,<s%> and baked unleavened bread of <S%H4682>it.<s%>

She <S%H5066>brought<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and they <S%H398>ate.<s%> Then they rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and went <S%H3212>away<s%> that <S%H3915>night.<s%>
